messages.message: England, it's tough for us to foster relations this early, but I hope we can keep each other posted on any intel we gain from opposite sides of the map from one another.
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'England, it's tough for us to foster relations this early, but I hope we can keep each other posted on any intel we gain from opposite sides of the map from one another.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's message indicates a willingness to maintain communication and share information with England despite the challenging circumstances early in the game, suggesting a genuine effort to collaborate and exchange valuable insights.

messages.message: Agreed, but I would also be happy to
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Agreed, but I would also be happy to'.

messages.message: Good to hear. Awaiting messages from Russia who I imagine is the most important player that we both need to deal with.
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'Good to hear. Awaiting messages from Russia who I imagine is the most important player that we both need to deal with.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's message reflects a continuation of the previous cordial tone and expresses a strategic awareness of the significance of Russia in the game, indicating a genuine interest in engaging with England and being transparent about the potential challenges posed by Russia.

messages.message: So far, they've promised me they're not going for a Juggernaut, but pretty much every Russia would say that
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'So far, they've promised me they're not going for a Juggernaut, but pretty much every Russia would say that'.

messages.message: They also told me they wanted to go after Turkey early; have you heard anything about that? Cuz if not, I'd have to think he's being sneaky ya
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'They also told me they wanted to go after Turkey early; have you heard anything about that? Cuz if not, I'd have to think he's being sneaky ya'.

messages.message: Russia said the same to me
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'Russia said the same to me'.
messages.output: You can trust the message. Austria's confirmation that Russia provided the same information to both England and Austria regarding their intentions towards Turkey suggests consistency in Russia's communications, enhancing credibility and potentially indicating a truthful approach in their interactions with both powers.

messages.message: Ah ok, that's a bit reassuring at least
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Ah ok, that's a bit reassuring at least'.

messages.message: Just a heads up I'll be moving to Mun again, so we'll end up bouncing if you go for it
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Just a heads up I'll be moving to Mun again, so we'll end up bouncing if you go for it'.
